title: Protects certain information on hunting, fishing and trapping license and permit applications from disclosure
summary: Protects certain information on hunting, fishing and trapping license and permit applications from disclosure or release outside of the department of environmental conservation.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         2648

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                   I N  S E N A T E

                                   January 27, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by  Sens.  GRISANTI,  MARCELLINO  --  read twice and ordered
         printed, and when printed to be committed to the Committee on Environ-
         mental Conservation

       AN ACT to amend the  environmental  conservation  law,  in  relation  to
         protecting  information  on  hunting, fishing and trapping license and
         permit applications from disclosure outside of the department of envi-
         ronmental conservation

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section  1.  Subdivision  2  of  section  11-0305 of the environmental
    2  conservation law, as amended by section 1 of part D of chapter 61 of the
    3  laws of 2000, is amended to read as follows:
    4    2. To issue the licenses and permits provided for by law, to fix their
    5  terms, and the fees therefor, when no statutory provision  is  made,  to
    6  designate  agents  to  sell  and  promote the sale of licenses, to adopt
    7  procedures for the issuance of licenses, to  establish  the  design  and
    8  format  of  licenses  and  the  information  to be contained thereon, TO
    9  PROTECT FROM DISCLOSURE OR RELEASE INFORMATION  SUBMITTED  TO  LICENSING
   10  AGENTS OR THE DEPARTMENT BY PERSONS SEEKING TO OBTAIN A HUNTING, FISHING
   11  OR  TRAPPING  LICENSE, PERMIT, STAMP, BUTTON OR TAG, CONSISTENT WITH THE
   12  PROVISIONS OF SUBDIVISION SEVEN OF SECTION 11-0713 OF THIS  ARTICLE,  to
   13  provide  where  it  deems  appropriate  for  tags  and buttons, to adopt
   14  license conditions respecting tagging or identifying fish  and  wildlife
   15  being possessed or transported, to establish procedures and requirements
   16  for  reporting  license  sales  and  handling  and remittance of license
   17  revenues by persons or entities issuing such licenses,  to  provide  for
   18  acceptable  methods  of  payment of license fees, and to revoke licenses
   19  and permits as provided by law;
   20    S 2. Section 11-0713 of the environmental conservation law is  amended
   21  by adding a new subdivision 7 to read as follows:

        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD06598-01-1

       S. 2648                             2

    1    7.  NOTWITHSTANDING ANY OTHER PROVISION OF LAW TO THE CONTRARY, INFOR-
    2  MATION PROVIDED TO A LICENSING AGENT OR THE DEPARTMENT BY  A  PERSON  IN
    3  FURTHERANCE  OF SUCH PERSON'S OBTAINING A LICENSE, PERMIT, STAMP, BUTTON
    4  OR TAG ISSUED PURSUANT TO THIS TITLE, SHALL NOT BE DISCLOSED OR RELEASED
    5  OUTSIDE  OF  THE  DEPARTMENT,  PROVIDED  THAT THIS SUBDIVISION SHALL NOT
    6  PROHIBIT THE DEPARTMENT FROM SHARING SUCH INFORMATION WITH: LAW ENFORCE-
    7  MENT PERSONNEL; OR STATE OR FEDERAL ENTITIES ENGAGED  IN  CHILD  SUPPORT
    8  ENFORCEMENT  AS AUTHORIZED AND REQUIRED BY STATE OR FEDERAL LAW OR REGU-
    9  LATION. THE DEPARTMENT SHALL ESTABLISH PROCEDURES TO  ENSURE  THAT  SUCH
   10  INFORMATION  IS  PROTECTED FROM DISCLOSURE OUTSIDE OF THE DEPARTMENT, AS
   11  PROVIDED IN THIS SUBDIVISION.
   12    S 3. This act shall take effect immediately.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to protecting information on hunting, fishing and trapping license and permit applications from disclosure outside of the department of environmental conservation
